title: Frontend Developer
content: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer proficient in React.js to build modern, responsive web applications and collaborate with design teams to deliver engaging user experiences.

title: Backend Developer
content: Join our team as a Backend Developer where you'll be designing scalable APIs, managing databases, and optimizing performance for high-traffic platforms using Node.js and Express.

title: Database Administrator
content: We are looking for a Database Administrator proficient in managing large-scale databases...

title: DevOps Engineer
content: Looking for a DevOps Engineer to manage and automate cloud infrastructure using Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, etc.
